item.title: The song of the ≠ne≠nebbi (woodpigeon)
item.summary: The song of the ≠ne≠nebbi, or woodpigeon, contributed by Tamme.
item.comments: 1) See also Song of the sho sho and Song of the ||ku and Song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe and The song of the sauko and The song of the ||noruko djo-djo and The song of the mother of the little buck and The song of the ≠na≠n'arro and The song of the Ngogan-a (a little bird) and The song of the !ke tsa'ba (a bird) and The song of the ||gani (a bird) and The song of the !korro-ssin !ku (or Pit-making Bushmen) and A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen) and The song of the !na !na'rishe (a bird), 2) This is found in Book XI & XII-3
item.author: Tamme (XII)
